hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Ali said:"The Messenger of Allah [SAW] forbade me to wear a ring on this one and this one," meaning the forefinger and middle finger. And this is the wording of Ibn Al-Muthanna

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنِ الْخَاتَمِ، فِي السَّبَّابَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Prohibition of Wearing the Ring on the Forefinger
